price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka kyerε wͻn a wͻ’po nokorε no sε: “Yε’bedi moso nkonim na y’aboaboa moano demo akͻgu Amanehunu-gyem, na εhͻ yε ahomegye bea bͻne paa.
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ سَتُغۡلَبُونَ وَتُحۡشَرُونَ إِلَىٰ جَهَنَّمَۖ وَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمِهَادُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul lilladhīna kafarū satugh'labūna watuḥ'sharūna ilā jahannama wabi'sa al-mihādu
